mapper.select: select rr.* from (select r.*, rownum rnum from (select b.*, f.grade from (select * from USER_RECORD where id=#{id}) b LEFT join USER_GRADE f on b.buy_total>=f.STANDARD order by ROWNUM desc) r) rr where rr.rnum = 1
select f.*, p.pro_name from (select b.*, s.state s from (SELECT * FROM ORDERTBL WHERE user_id=#{id}) b left join STATE s on b.state=s.state_NUM) f left join PRODUCTTBL p on f.pro_num=p.pro_num
select rr.* from (select r.*, rownum rnum from (select * from q_and_a where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc)r)rr where rr.rnum <=5
select * from Q_AND_A where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc
select rr.* from (select r.*, rownum rnum from (select * from counsel where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc)r)rr where rr.rnum <=5
select * from counsel where user_id=#{id} order by rownum desc
mapper.insert: insert into counsel(num, cate, user_id, title, content, counsel_date, image_uuid) values (counsel_seq.nextval, #{cate}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, sysdate, #{fileuuid})
mapper.update: UPDATE USER_MEMBER SET pass = #{newpass} where id=#{id}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ORDERTBL where USER_ID=#{id}

select bbb.*,p.pro_name from(select bb.*,cc.state s from(select b.* from (select c.*, rownum rnum from (SELECT * FROM ORDERTBL where ORDERTBL.USER_ID=#{id} order by order_DATE desc )c )b where b.rnum between #{start} and #{end}) bb left join state cc on bb.state=cc.state_num)bbb left join producttbl p on bbb.pro_num=p.pro_num

select st.*, nvl(ta.count, 0) count from state st left join (select b.state, count(*) count from (select * from ORDERTBL where user_id=#{id} and sysdate-order_date <60)b group by state) ta on st.STATE_NUM = ta.state order by st.STATE_NUM
select * from ORDERTBL where order_num=#{num} and user_id=#{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE PRODUCTTBL set PRO_QTY=PRO_QTY+#{order_qty} where PRO_NUM=#{pro_num}
UPDATE ORDERTBL set state=8 where ORDER_NUM=#{num} and user_id=#{id}
